channel.title: RE [PI] Running on linux Centos 4.8
channel.description:
I installed java evrthynk to my vps but i got this problem with running pi's here a pictures [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MSMIu.png[/img]
and here i have that mina.jar so whats the problem??? samone help :confused:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NJDNH.png[/img] .sh [code] #!/bin/bash java -Xmx256m -cp bin:,deps-poi.jar:,deps-mysql.jar:,deps-mina.jar:,deps-slf4j.jar:,deps-slf4j-nop.jar:,deps-jython.jar:,log4j-1.2.15.jar:, server.Server[/code]
and here is original windows run.bat
[code]java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server[/code]

item.title: RE [PI] Running on linux Centos 4.8
item.dc:creator: @crazyfazespy crazyfazespy
item.description:
@crazyfazespy wrote:

idk if i did it correctly suz im newbie it linux
i opened terminal it server
and typed: chmod 777 run.sh
then typed: sh run.sh
is it what did you mean?

Read full topic

item.title: RE [PI] Running on linux Centos 4.8
item.dc:creator: @thisisthe21 thisisthe21
item.description:
@thisisthe21 wrote:

Set the permissions to 777 via CHMod.

Read full topic

server class is here but idk maby linux os dont undersdand server.server i will try change it and reply results

Even then i replaced server.server with server/server
same error
samone help please anythink you know can help my alot
